text: Dlya vas, lyudi, v korovakh, verblyudakh i ovtsakh - nazidaniye, ot kotorogo sleduyet pouchit'sya i kotorym sleduyet rukovodstvovat'sya, chtoby izbavit'sya ot nevezhestva i poluchit' znaniya o mudrom Tvortse. My poim vas iz togo, chto u nikh v zheludke - chistym molokom, vkusnym i poleznym dlya p'yushchikh
